content: my everything is an overlay mosaic crochet pattern dedicated to those we love the most included in the pattern are some different color combination ideas as well as size and yardage for both dk-weight and worsted-weight yarn it includes the original pattern pdf printer-friendly pdf and a guide to overlay mosaic crochet i made mine with dk-weight cozy wool merino by loops & threads in pumpkin and white the piece measures 31 x 23 without the border i used 400 yards of white and 580 yards of pumpkin with an additional 220 yards for the border the size is subject to change depending on your crochet gauge and yarn/hook choices i have also included instructions and a photo tutorial on how to anchor your stitches for the long runs of flodc this is beginner level pattern and includes a beginner s guide on how to do mosaic crochet the pdf does include a photo tutorial on creating a basic envelope border the pdf pattern is written in u s terminology and includes the full written pattern in a row-by-row format as well as the ticked graphs the written format is in a new easier to read format also included is a printer-friendly pdf that allows you to print only the necessities for the pattern please note that different yarns different tensions and different hook sizes will all utilize a different amount of yarn all yarn totals are included in the pattern there are also estimations of yardage needed for varying sizes of blankets **gauge** worsted weight 4 x4 = 14st x 14st dk weight 4 x 4 = 18st x 18st join us on facebook for a 10% off code www facebook com/groups/crochetwithmay/ if you are new to my designs please note i use f to indicate a front loop only stitch and b to indicate a back loop only stitch in the written portion of the pattern please credit me as the designer when you post your work the work created from this pattern may be sold again please credit me this pattern is for personal use only any recreations alterations or selling of this pattern and/or its derivatives is prohibited you cannot share this pattern with others and cannot create video tutorials using this pattern if you find any mistakes or just want to share your work feel free to contact me i also want to add a special thank you to my testers thank you
